descriptionHtml:
This mod added four DWARVES (not dwemers) followers to game, with different characteristics: Dorin, Gilbur, Kirlian and Bofin.

DORIN

Style: Two-handed, heavy armor, block.
Weapon: Battle Axe.
Location: Silver-Blood Inn (Markarth).

GILBUR

Style: One-handed, light armor, block.
Weapon: War Axe x2.
Location: The Bee and Barb (Riften).

KIRLIAN (female)

Style: One-handed, heavy armor, block.
Weapon: Sword and shield.
Location: Old Hroldan Inn (The Reach).

BOFIN

Style: Two-handed, heavy armor, block.
Weapon: War Hammer.
Location: Nightgate Inn (The Pale).
author: Blood390
